parameters.name: DesignateType
parameters.description: The type of the machines to be designated. Valid values: 1 and 2. The value 1 specifies the worker type. The value 2 specifies the label type.

parameters.name: Labels
parameters.description: The designated `labels`. Specify the value of the parameter in a `JSON` string.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the namespace.

parameters.name: Transferable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to allow a failover.

parameters.name: Workers
parameters.description: The designated machines. Specify the value of the parameter in a JSON string.
